title: Riot hates me
body: Okay, so I was gold in the previous season, and got to S2 in this season, winning like 5 out of 10 games. I got to s1 eventually and from that point on I've started to decline a lot, and I swear to god, it's not my fault ( I know it's a cliche ). Now I'm in S5 with 0 points, and if you look at my previous match history you'll see that I barely ever lose out my lane, and I try to carry, but no one can carry that, I just finished a game where I was at one point 5/1 on Lucian, with a support Morgana who gave out first blood, then died 2 times after that, in like 3 minutes. And not to mention top Yasuo, who ended up with 0/8, next to 0/10 Morgana. I get it that someone loses a lane, I do it too, but I don't feed as much, these games are beyond recovery, 10 minutes into the game they're all godlike. And I just keep on losing, and losing, when I win a game I have to be like 20/2 or beyond fed to carry this. Last 5 victories I had were 22/3/10 with Diana, 21/8/11 with Jayce, 21/2/12 and 12/4/18 with Ez and 20/2/6 with 318 farm with Graves top. This is something that keeps on happening and I can't deal with it anymore, I'm thinking of quitting the League for good, this is just frustrating.

replies.body: Don't follow metas so hard, that your at the point where your  not even checking  enemy item builds or trying to build for how your team is playing. (e.g going tanky if your team holds abilities hard for single kills instead of clusters or going damage if your team's doing really good and you can just solo roam). http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0009

Lmao just be glad your actually good at the game.

I only just started playing ranked recently and I was like the happiest man on earth when I got from B5 to B4 lol

> [{quoted}](name=Miicka,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=AIOLHaVt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-27T15:44:26.093+0000)
>
> Lmao just be glad your actually good at the game.
> 
> I only just started playing ranked recently and I was like the happiest man on earth when I got from B5 to B4 lol

soon u will start raging mate trust me, u will feel our pain

I've had his issue for months. I can hold my own in lane against gold and plat players and yet I play solo queue dynamic on the current patch and cannot for the life of me win 50% of my games in bronze matches. Even duo isn't enough, so I've been forced to trio or quad man dynamic to have half a chance. It's a real shame because this game used to be fun and if you put in the hard work to improve you would see results but not anymore =-\
